sidebar.supporterMessage: Please consider becoming a <emphasis>Supporter</emphasis> to keep the project alive!

sponsorDialog.title: Complexity Needs Your Help!
sponsorDialog.description: Maintaining Complexity requires a significant amount of time and effort. Show your appreciation by supporting its development and helping keep it completely free and open-source for the entire community.
